mapper.select: SELECT empl_name, empl_per_email FROM employee WHERE empl_id = #{id} AND empl_per_email = #{email}

SELECT e.empl_idx, e.empl_name, e.empl_id, e.empl_pw, e.empl_gender, e.empl_birth, e.empl_ssn1, e.empl_ssn2, e.empl_account, e.empl_cmp_email, e.empl_cmp_phone, e.empl_per_email, e.empl_per_phone, e.empl_addr, e.empl_emp_state, e.empl_join_date, e.empl_resig_date, e.empl_stamp, e.empl_profile, e.bank_idx, e.empl_changepw, e.file_key, a.dept_idx, a.position_idx, a.duty_idx, a.appo_idx, a.appo_empl_idx, a.empl_job, a.movein_date, a.transfer_date, p.position_name, dt.duty_name, d.dept_name FROM employee e JOIN appointment a ON e.empl_idx = a.appo_empl_idx JOIN department d ON a.dept_idx = d.dept_idx JOIN position_ p ON a.position_idx = p.position_idx JOIN duty dt ON a.duty_idx = dt.duty_idx WHERE e.empl_id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE employee SET empl_pw = #{encryptPw} WHERE empl_id = #{id}
